properties.summary: Lego is a line of plastic construction toys that are manufactured by The Lego Group, a company based in Denmark. The toys consist of colorful interlocking plastic bricks and an accompanying array of gears, mini-figures, and various other parts. The Lego Group was founded in 1932, and the name "Lego" is derived from the Danish words "leg godt," meaning "play well." The Lego brand has expanded significantly over the years, including various themes such as Lego City, Lego Star Wars, and Lego Harry Potter, as well as partnerships with movies and video games. The company has also ventured into digital media, including video games and animated films.
properties.title: Lego
